(6) What is the relevance of ESRS 1 paragraph 18 if materiality takes precedence over
ESRS 1 paragraph 18?
ESRS 1 paragraph 18 illustrates the nature or drafting convention used for the datapoints, and it
has to be applied in conjunction with the materiality considerations – i.e. the ‘shall’ datapoints
are still subject to materiality assessment.
Question ID 106 - Entity-specific guidance and examples
Release date
February 2024
